price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, an ƙaryata manzanni daga gabãninka, sai suka yi haƙuri a kan abin da aka ƙaryata su, kuma aka cũtar da su, har taimakon Mu ya je musu, kuma babu mai musanyãwa ga kalmõmin Allah. Kuma lalle ne (abin da yake natsar da kai) ya zo maka daga lãbãrin (annabãwan) farko.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَصَبَرُواْ عَلَىٰ مَا كُذِّبُواْ وَأُوذُواْ حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰهُمۡ نَصۡرُنَاۚ وَلَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكَ مِن نَّبَإِيْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika faṣabarū ʿalā mā kudhibū waūdhū ḥattā atāhum naṣrunā walā mubaddila likalimāti al-lahi walaqad jāaka min naba-i al-mur'salīna
